SEARCH

Class CsvHandler

java.lang.Object
CsvHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOHandler
public class CsvHandler extends Object implements IOHandler
CsvHandler provides methods to handle CSV file operations, including reading, writing, updating, and managing data in memory.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Map<String,String[]>

    Stores data rows, keyed by a unique ID.
